summary: With this tool you can keep and play both Skyrim and Enderal (in dofferent folders) without installing/uninstalling.
descriptionHtml:
Sorry for my English knowledge, but I sure, you can understand this description correctly.

SEndSwitch is a simple tool, created for using both Skyrim and Enderal (IN DIFFERENT FOLDERS).
Because of some Windows issues and my limited C# knowledge you need to copy this tool both in Skyrim and Enderal folders. (May be I will fix this problem in updates, or just will create different lounchers for Skyrim and for Enderal)
Tool settings will be stored in C:\Users\Public\SES_settings.txt.
WHAT THIS PROGRAM DOES:
It simply renames ini settings and plugins.txt files, because both games using this files, but each of its requires different settings.

Temporary names are:

S.SkyrimPrefs.ini.ses - Skyrim's SkyrimPrefs.ini,
S.Skyrim.ini.ses - Skyrim's Skyrim.ini,
S.plugins.txt.ses - Skyrim's plugins.txt,

E.SkyrimPrefs.ini.ses - Enderal's SkyrimPrefs.ini,
E.Skyrim.ini.ses - Enderal's Skyrim.ini,
E.plugins.txt.ses - Enderal's plugins.txt,

INSTALLATION:
1. Copy SEndSwitch.exe in Skyrim and Enderal directories
2. Rename files of game, you want to be launched first in default names (Without E.<...>.ses or S.<...>.ses)
3. Files of second game must be renamed in temporary names
4. Launch one of SEndSwitch.exe files.
5. Input correct paths of your settings files and game folders
6. Try to switch "Skyrim" and "Enderal" radiobuttons, if steps 1-5 are done correctly, you can see changes in settings folders. Else the tool can catch an exception.
7. Choose tool settings, how you want it be and click "Save settings" or "Launch".

ISSUES:
IF THE TOOL THROW AN EXCEPTION MESSAGE, CHECK YOUR GAME/SETTINGS PATHS.
IF GAMES CLOSING WHILE LOAD AND/OR YOU SEE IN-GAME "MOD-MISSING" MESSAGES, CHECK NAMES OF GAME SETTINS FILES OR WHICH FILE YOU LAUNCHED - CORRECT USING IS LAUNCHING EXE FROM FOLDER, WHERE IS A GAME, YOU WANT TO START.
author: stahlketze
